keyword: how many calories in mcdonalds fries small
title: How Many Calories in McDonald's Small Fries?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in McDonald's fries small, including full nutrition breakdown, macros, sodium, and quick tweaks for your order.
h1: How Many Calories in McDonald's Small Fries?
assumptions: Standard U.S. McDonald's small french fries (~71 g), cooked in vegetable oil blend, salted.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, country, menu changes, and preparation; based on official McDonald's data. Check app or website for latest.

quick_answer.text: McDonald's small fries contain 230 calories, with 30 g carbs and 11 g fat.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in McDonald's small fries?
What are the carbs in McDonald's small fries?
faqs.a: About 30 g total carbs, including 3 g fiber and 0 g sugars.

faqs.q: How much sodium is in small McDonald's fries?
faqs.a: 160 mg of sodium per small order.

faqs.q: Are McDonald's small fries high in fat?
faqs.a: Yes, 11 g total fat (1.5 g saturated) from the oil frying.

faqs.q: How do calories compare to medium McDonald's fries?
faqs.a: Medium has about 300 calories, 70 more than small.
